com.ubudu.sdk

Interface UbuduBeacon

  • All Superinterfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    public interface UbuduBeacon
extends android.os.Parcelable
    Instances of UbuduBeacon represent actual beacons detected.

    • Method Detail

      • proximityUUID

        java.lang.String proximityUUID()
        Returns:
        the proximityUUID of the detected device.

      • major

        int major()
        Returns:
        the major identifier of detected device

      • minor

        int minor()
        Returns:
        the minor identifier of the detected device.

      • name

        java.lang.String name()
        Returns:
        name of the detected bluetooth device.

      • rssi

        double rssi()
        Returns:
        the RSSI of the detected device in dBm units.

      • detectedProximity

        int detectedProximity()
        Returns:
        the maximum (closest) promixity detected for the beacon.

      • nativeDevice

        android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice nativeDevice()
        Returns:
        the native device detected.

      • accuracy

        java.lang.Double accuracy()
        Returns:
        estimated distance to the detected device.

      • txPower

        int txPower()
        Returns:
        tx power of the beacon as power received with iPhone 5S at 1 meter distance from the device.

      • lastSeen

        java.util.Date lastSeen()
        Returns:
        last seen timestamp of this beacon
